title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:16 <jvelociter> has left #xwiki  
01:04 <sburjan`> has quit  
01:04 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
03:04 <pgmjsd> has left #xwiki  
07:01 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
07:03 <Denis> has quit  
08:29 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:30 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* re370ef6 / (2 files in 2 dirs): Merge branch 'master' of github.com:xwiki/xwiki-platform into feature-applicationWithinMinutes - http://git.io/7w9FDw  
08:30 <CIA-102> tmortagne feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* r6e89c29 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-api/src/main/resources/extension/licenses/Mozilla Public License 1.1.txt : XWIKI-7100: Add Mozilla license - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/6e89c29157723766496c2804f5e7de4aacef1d42  
08:30 <CIA-102> tmortagne feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* r796aae6 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-wiki-manager/xwiki-platform-wiki-manager-api/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/plugin/wikimanager/WikiManager.java :  
08:30 <CIA-102> XWIKI-7089: Provide a script service bridge in Application Manager  
08:30 <CIA-102> plugin  
08:30 <CIA-102> Make sure to access the plugin even when it's not registered - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/796aae6efd0a4f0af3f3a9aad282c9d535a564eb  
08:40 <tekzilla> has quit  
08:42 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
09:19 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:27 <Denis2> is now known as <Denis>  
09:28 <+tmortagne> and good morning :)  
09:42 <vmassol> good morning  
09:51 <vmassol> tmortagne: so the home page is now the new one?  
09:52 <vmassol> (what is this empty id column?)  
09:52 <vmassol> (I don't think we need it on the home page)  
09:52 <vmassol> (if it's the extension id)  
09:52 <+tmortagne> vmassol: yep  
09:53 <+tmortagne> yes it's the extension id and it's empty because none of the extensions provide it  
09:53 <+tmortagne> yea since I added the name it's probably not absolutely needed anymore  
10:02 <sburjan`> has quit  
10:07 <+tmortagne> vmassol: any idea how the livetable tag cloud is working ? whatever the tag I clicking on I don't get any result  
10:12 <CIA-102> Denis Gervalle feature-immutable-refs \* r14d5ce4 / (9 files in 4 dirs):  
10:12 <CIA-102> XWIKI-7097 Make EntityReference immutables, adding parameters to EntityReference and allowing Locale and Version in DocumentReference  
10:12 <CIA-102> - Fix failing deprecated document constructor test  
10:12 <CIA-102> - Add the copy/replace constructor on all kind of reference for ease and speed - http://git.io/mQxosA  
10:14 <vmassol> tmortagne: working fine for me  
10:15 <+tmortagne> maybe it's with FF8 then  
10:17 <+tmortagne> vmassol: what tag did you tested ?  
10:18 <+tmortagne> hmm in fact it looks like whatever the tag I click on it actually choose "watch"  
10:20 <+tmortagne> works well on chrome for me  
10:20 <+tmortagne> so it's definitely an issue with FF8  
10:24 <+tmortagne> hmm same issue with FF6  
10:24 <vmassol> I'm on chrome  
10:31 <+tmortagne> could you do a quick check with whatever version of FF you have ?  
10:31 <+tmortagne> vmassol:  
10:31 <vmassol> yep  
10:32 <+tmortagne> created http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7101  
10:32 <vmassol> doesn't work for me either  
10:33 <+tmortagne> ok modifying the title of the issue then  
10:33 <vmassol> ep  
10:33 <vmassol> yep  
10:33 <+tmortagne> funny, usually it's the opposite ;)  
10:33 <+tmortagne> (things working FF and not on Chrome)  
10:55 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
11:23 <+sburjan> vmassol: I managed to create the table from the query :)  
11:24 <+sburjan> now I want to optimize a little bit. I am sure we will modify a lot of it in order to make a decent code quality level :)  
11:26 <vmassol> sburjan: cool  
11:52 <vmassol> tmortagne: you should protect ExtensionCode space IMO  
11:53 <+tmortagne> vmassol: I did not created this space, I tough it was protected already  
11:54 <+tmortagne> vmassol: are you doing it ? you have a lock on the page  
11:54 <vmassol> you can force it  
11:54 <vmassol> I'm not doing anything  
11:55 <+tmortagne> vmassol: as far as I can see it's protected already  
11:57 <vmassol> indeed it is  
11:57 <+tmortagne> vmassol: I think there is something wrong with what you just modified  
11:57 <+tmortagne> looks like you missed the space  
11:57 <vmassol> created, deleted  
11:58 <+tmortagne> ok did not seen there was a delete  
12:00 <vmassol> tmortagne: do you know where caty has put the SSX on extensions.xwiki.org?  
12:01 <vmassol> ok found it I think  
12:01 <vmassol> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ExtensionCode/SkinExtension  
12:03 <vmassol> btw tmortagne the JSX should be on demand and not always  
12:17 <vmassol> tmortagne: I think you have a bug here: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/WebHome?viewer=code  
12:17 <vmassol> the form field to add an extension is called "id" but you use "name" to redirect to the inline action  
12:17 <vmassol> (and for the titleà  
12:17 <vmassol> try contributing an extension, you'll see what happens  
12:43 <vmassol> ok I've created a new FAQ application: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/WebHomeNew  
12:44 <vmassol> now we need to clean up 242+63 old FAQ entries ;)  
13:28 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* rb3a0a81 / (3 files): AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditor: Improve handling of Boolean properties. - http://git.io/4Me3jA  
13:55 <CIA-102> tmortagne master \* r131246d / (2 files in 2 dirs):  
13:55 <CIA-102> XWIKI-7103: Rendering cache does not take into account POST request  
13:55 <CIA-102> parameters - http://git.io/WTywrA  
13:55 <mflorea> has quit  
13:57 <sburjan> has quit  
13:57 <+tmortagne> vmassol: looking, issue is that I did not directly imported XR which is well tested but getting part of it to try to not break anything while I'm converting it  
13:59 <vmassol> tmortagne: it's easy to fix, but right now I think contributing an extension is broken  
14:01 <vmassol> yep :)  
14:03 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
14:08 <+tmortagne> vmassol: it's fixed now, there was several issues actually  
14:21 <CIA-102> tmortagne master \* re2af77d / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/internal/cache/rendering/DefaultRenderingCache.java :  
14:21 <CIA-102> XWIKI-7103: Rendering cache does not take into account POST request  
14:21 <CIA-102> parameters  
14:21 <CIA-102> Fix checkstyle - http://git.io/NQSOKg  
14:50 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
15:02 <+sburjan> vmassol: are you ok for a meeting in about an hour ?  
15:04 <vmassol> sburjan: ok  
15:23 <vmassol> sburjan: you didn't publish the browser strategy on xwiki.org did you?  
15:23 <+sburjan> no, I didn't  
15:27 <vmassol> tmortagne: this page is broken: http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Features  
15:28 <vmassol> maybe it's caused by your recent changes  
15:28 <+tmortagne> vmassol: what is this supposed to do ?  
15:28 <vmassol> list all extensions bundled in XE  
15:28 <+tmortagne> and how is it broken ? since it looks well for me  
15:28 <+tmortagne> what's missing ?  
15:28 <vmassol> edit the page content  
15:29 <vmassol> it used to display nicely all bundled apps  
15:29 <+tmortagne> done  
15:30 <vmassol> cool  
15:30 <vmassol> you could chek XEM too  
15:30 <vmassol> yep same: http://manager.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Features  
15:31 <+tmortagne> so it's going to be hard to get rid of this "bundled with" field...  
15:36 <+tmortagne> hmm I could add a new object actually  
15:36 <+tmortagne> like BundledExtensionClass  
15:38 <vmassol> sburjan: ok I'm handling it  
15:46 <CIA-102> tmortagne master \* r45e797e / xwiki-platform-tools/xwiki-platform-tool-configuration-resources/src/main/resources/xwiki.properties.vm : Improve the documentation - http://git.io/GQJaJA  
16:18 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r949ad81 / xwiki-platform-tools/xwiki-platform-tool-configuration-resources/src/main/resources/xwiki.properties.vm : Further improve the documentation - http://git.io/Rxafig  
16:21 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* re8dd091 / xwiki-platform-tools/xwiki-platform-tool-configuration-resources/src/main/resources/xwiki.properties.vm : typo - http://git.io/YAqIyg  
16:23 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r7ebd3d1 / xwiki-platform-tools/xwiki-platform-tool-configuration-resources/src/main/resources/xwiki.properties.vm : small improvement - http://git.io/IogkBg  
16:36 <+sburjan> vmassol: around ?  
16:36 <vmassol> yep  
16:39 <+sburjan> let/s go in private  
18:02 <tmortagne> has left #xwiki  
18:04 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
18:04 <+jvelociter> Hi guys  
18:04 <+jvelociter> Does anyone know if we can do multiplications in XWQL ?  
18:04 <+jvelociter> I´ve tried \* and mul() with no success  
18:05 <+jvelociter> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/QueryGuide does not say much  
18:05 <+jvelociter> cjdelisle:  ?  
18:05 <+jvelociter> sum() works though  
18:06 <@cjdelisle> usually you can use hibernate functions in XWQL  
18:07 <+jvelociter> \* is supported by JPQL http://www.objectdb.com/java/jpa/query/jpql/expression  
18:07 <+jvelociter> so strange it won´t work for me  
18:08 <@cjdelisle> it's bad for XWQL portibility but you can generally just look up the function in the HQL manual and pass it to the XWQL parsen  
18:08 <@cjdelisle> \*parser  
18:08 <+jvelociter> I will try prod()  
18:10 <sburjan> has quit  
18:10 <mflorea> has quit  
18:12 <@cjdelisle> looks like there isn't anything other than sum() avg() min() max() and count()  
18:15 <+jvelociter> :(  
18:17 <pgmjsd> has joined #xwiki

19:31 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
20:02 <pgmjsd> has joined #xwiki  
20:03 <mclark> has joined #xwiki  
20:04 <mclark> Hi team.  I'm having a problem getting the LDAP authentication to work. We're using SSL (not TLS) against OpenLDAP, but every time I try to auth I get 'Invalid Credentials', and "TLS Negotiation Failure" in the slapd.conf.  Is there a way to stop xwiki from attempting TLS?  
20:05 <vmassol> Hi mclark, a pity, our LDAP expert has left for the day....  
20:05 <vmassol> I personally don't know much about it  
20:06 <mclark> I'm happy to look at the source, but I'm having trouble locating the LDAP code.  Does anyone know which git repo, and an approximate location for the ldap code?  
20:06 <vmassol> yep this I can hep you with :)  
20:07 <mclark> great, thx :)  
20:07 <vmassol> this is not the cleanest part of our code though…. ;)  
20:08 <mclark> np  
20:08 <vmassol> hold on  
20:10 <vmassol> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/tree/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/user/impl/LDAP  
20:10 <vmassol> and https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/tree/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/plugin/ldap  
20:10 <vmassol> (mclark)  
20:11 <mclark> Exactly what I needed, thanks
